item.title: Manage your Jenkins with CLI
item.description: Modern software is incredibly complex. That makes operations a hard job. Architectures like microservices, increases the operational complexity multiple orders of magnitude. So, its crucial that every part of operations is automated. Because when adopting such patterns there is an explosion in the number of components that need to be maintained. Doing this manually is inefficient as well as painful for the engineers who are tasked to do the maintenance. One such area is managing your CI ojbects.
